author: markt
msg: Use SocketStatus.OPEN rather than STOP since the BIO connector treats them the same way and it reduces code complexity. It also simplifies async re-factoring I have in the works,

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2872: make the broker indicate a heartbeat max of 0sec to cause the client disable heartbeating, as it otherwise enables the connection idle timeout by default and the broker cant generate them.
Needed until QPID-2796 is undertaken to implement broker support for generating heartbeats.

author: robbie
msg: QPID-2877: remove erroneous space from label
